name: Simple User Registration
author: Najeeb Ahmad

sections.description:
A Simple WordPress plugin to turn your site into a membership site. It will generate all necessary pages required for
any membership site. Awesome drag and drop field editor creates signup page so quickly. Members can manage profile on
frontend. For More Detail See Video Below:


See More Videos

Demo

How to use

Plugin Guide

Plugin Features

  • Unlimited Members Forms
  • Auto Generate Member Pages
  • Manage Redirects
  • User Profile
  • Dashboard
  • Profile Based URL
  • Edit Profile
  • New User Notifications
  • Translation Ready

Pro Features

  • Multi-step Registration
  • More Input Fields
  • Change Password
  • Restrict Pages by Role
  • Hide Admin Bar
  • Member Direclty
  • Auto Login
  • Email Verification
  • Manual Verification
  • Activate/Deactivate Members
  • Singup By Role
  • GDPR Settings
  • Email Templates
  • Templates Override
  • Fields Privacy Control
  • Redirects by Role
  • Fields Icons
  • Form Design
  • Login PopUp
  • Google reCAPTCHA
  • Integration with MailChimp and SendinBlue
    Visite for more detail

Quick Message to Members

Since version 4.3, Admin can message via email to selected members from Dashboard with subject. See screenshot-16
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can set options from WP Register menu
